    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) static int[] averageWordSize​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n)
    Reads the text in 'fileIn' and returns an array containing the average word size of the first 'n' lines in the text.
    (package private) static void copyPositionMultiple​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n, java.lang.String fileOut)
    Copies to 'fileOut' the lines of the text in 'fileIn' that are in a position multiple of 'n'.
    (package private) static void oneWordPerLine​(java.lang.String fileIn, java.lang.String fileOut)
    For every line in 'fileIn', writes in 'fileOut' a line consisting of the line number and the line's last word.
    (package private) static void rotateEveryWord​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n, java.lang.String fileOut)
    Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn' after modifying the text with the following parameters: The last 'n' letters of a word will be move to the start of the word.
    (package private) static void switchNextWordNextLine​(java.lang.String fileIn, java.lang.String fileOut)
    Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn' after modifying the text with the following parameters: For each pair of lines changes the word in position "k" of the 1st line with the word in position "k+1" of the 2nd line, if k is an odd number.
    (package private) static void vowelSubstitution​(java.lang.String fileIn, char c, java.lang.String fileOut)
    Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn', substituting all vowels with a given character.

    • SEPARATORS

      private static final java.lang.String SEPARATORS
      Possible word separators (used in String split). Value: "\\s*[ ,.]\\s*"
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • TUTEDECC

      public TUTEDECC()

  • Method Details

    • copyPositionMultiple

      static void copyPositionMultiple​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n, java.lang.String fileOut) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Copies to 'fileOut' the lines of the text in 'fileIn' that are in a position multiple of 'n'.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      n - Number whose multiples will be copied.
      fileOut - Pathname of the output file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible. If 'fileOut' is inaccessible.

    • vowelSubstitution

      static void vowelSubstitution​(java.lang.String fileIn, char c, java.lang.String fileOut) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn', substituting all vowels with a given character.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      c - Character vowels will be substituted for.
      fileOut - Pathname of the output file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible. If 'fileOut' is inaccessible.
      ”Requires”
      No accentuated vowels.

    • averageWordSize

      static int[] averageWordSize​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Reads the text in 'fileIn' and returns an array containing the average word size of the first 'n' lines in the text.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      n - Number of lines to read (size of the array).
      Returns:
      An array containing the average word size of the first 'n' lines in the text.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible.
      ”Requires”
      Text must have at least 'n' lines.

    • oneWordPerLine

      static void oneWordPerLine​(java.lang.String fileIn, java.lang.String fileOut) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      For every line in 'fileIn', writes in 'fileOut' a line consisting of the line number and the line's last word.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      fileOut - Pathname of the output file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible. If 'fileOut' is inaccessible.
      ”Requires”
      Word separators can only be spaces, dots, or commas.

    • rotateEveryWord

      static void rotateEveryWord​(java.lang.String fileIn, int n, java.lang.String fileOut) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn' after modifying the text with the following parameters: The last 'n' letters of a word will be move to the start of the word. Words with length equal or lesser than 'n' will remain unchanged.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      n - Number of characters to move.
      fileOut - Pathname of the output file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible. If 'fileOut' is inaccessible.
      ”Requires”
      Text can only have letters and/or spaces

    • switchNextWordNextLine

      static void switchNextWordNextLine​(java.lang.String fileIn, java.lang.String fileOut) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Copies to 'fileOut' the text in 'fileIn' after modifying the text with the following parameters: For each pair of lines changes the word in position "k" of the 1st line with the word in position "k+1" of the 2nd line, if k is an odd number.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - Pathname of the input file.
      fileOut - Pathname of the output file.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If 'fileIn' does not exist or is inaccessible. If 'fileOut' is inaccessible.
